title: LFT gold 3 flexible with any role besides adc
body: Title.. Add me in-game or post here. Happy to play below, at or above my level. Have skype and don't rage HMU

replies.body:
Hey mate, 
Currently me and my mate that are Gold 5 are looking for 3 if your interested,
we use teamspeak.

Hit me up on league "Toxiciex"
